article.description: San Francisco pull away in OT, tops Pacific 81-72
article.headline: San Francisco pull away in OT, tops Pacific 81-72
article.linkText: San Francisco pull away in OT, tops Pacific 81-72
article.story: STOCKTON, Calif. -- Avry Holmes finished with 18 points and eight assists, both career highs, as San Francisco pulled away from Pacific in overtime for an 81-72 win Thursday night. Matt Glover added 16 points, nine rebounds and five assists for San Francisco (11-6, 4-1 West Coast Conference). Cole Dickerson finished with 14 points and eight boards. USF, which came into the game ranked tenth in the WCC in opponent's field goal percentage (46.4 percent) outscored Pacific 18-9 in the extra frame and allowed the Tigers to shoot just 32 percent (18 of 57) from the field. Andrew Bock scored 17 points to pace Pacific (9-6, 0-4). Tony Gill added 15 and seven rebounds while Ross Rivera scored 14 and Trevin Harris chipped in with 10 points. USF and Pacific have played 95 times, with Pacific now holding a 60-35 advantage, dating back to the 1911-12 season.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
